name: ts3or3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: sylibr(w0, wo(wn(w1), w3o(w2, w3, w1)), wo(wn(w1), wo(wo(w2, w3), w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), w3o(w2, w3, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), wo(wo(w2, w3), w1)))
-| wb(wo(wn(w1), w3o(w2, w3, w1)), wo(wn(w1), wo(wo(w2, w3), w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), w3o(w2, w3, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), wo(wo(w2, w3), w1)))
-| wb(wo(wn(w1), w3o(w2, w3, w1)), wo(wn(w1), wo(wo(w2, w3), w1)))

|- wi(w0, wo(wn(w1), w3o(w2, w3, w1)))
-| wb(wo(wn(w1), w3o(w2, w3, w1)), wo(wn(w1), wo(wo(w2, w3), w1)))

stmt.origin: orbi2i(wn(w1), w3o(w2, w3, w1), wo(wo(w2, w3), w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wn(w1), w3o(w2, w3, w1)), wo(wn(w1), wo(wo(w2, w3), w1)))
-| wb(w3o(w2, w3, w1), wo(wo(w2, w3), w1))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for triple logical disjunction, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 25-Mar-2018.)
